description: A vscode plugin that provides agents with the ability to access the swanlab API
tool.listWorkspaces.name: List Workspaces
tool.listWorkspaces.description: List all workspaces of the current SwanLab user
tool.listProjects.name: List Projects
tool.listProjects.description: List all projects in a workspace

tool.listExperiments.description: List all experiments in a project
tool.getExperiment.name: Get Experiment
tool.getExperiment.description: Get detailed information about an experiment
tool.getSummary.name: Get Summary
tool.getSummary.description: Get summary information of an experiment
tool.getMetrics.name: Get Metrics
tool.getMetrics.description: Get metrics data of an experiment
tool.deleteExperiment.name: Delete Experiment
tool.deleteProject.name: Delete Project
configuration.title: SwanLab Settings
